metadata.description: Beyond the peaks and valleys of the Himalaya Mountains lies a magical sanctuary. Protected from the chaos of man, it is home to immortal beings and mystical creatures. When Vijaya, a young human, is brought into the sanctuary for her protection, some immortals fear her presence may lead to their ruin.  But as mankind draws ever closer to the sanctuary's border, Vijaya will have to prove that there is more to being human than the violence her new family fears beyond their borders.  David Jesus Vignolli's debut graphic novel A Girl in the Himalayas explores the astonishing potential of the human spirit.
metadata.name: A Girl in the Himalayas
